name: Venus
description: Its designer is unknown. The special hovering EM Blaster's prototype's blueprint has been lost. It contains a unique electrical saving process in its interior. It's extremely troublesome to repair when it gets worn out, but Cobalt-B of Banges Tech seems to be able to do it.

skills.normal_des:
While on the ground, use Venus to attack 5 times in a row.
The first attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
The second attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
The third attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{4}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{5}</>.
The fourth attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{6}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{7}</>.
The fifth attack deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{8}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{9}</>.
skills.dodge: Dodge right before being hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds while dodging.
skills.skill: Venus fires a guided missile that explodes on contact with enemy targets, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</> and knocking down targets. Cooldown: <shuzhi>25</> seconds.
skills.discharge:
When <red>weapon charge is full</> or <red>Phantasia</> is triggered, switching to this weapon will <shuzhi>remove all debuffs from the user</> and command Venus to fire a cross-shaped ray at the ground, creating an unstable area and slowing targets' movement speed by <shuzhi>70%</> for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. After a brief delay, unleash an electromagnetic burst that deals damage equal to <shuzhi>{0}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{1}</>.
Using a discharge attack will spawn <shuzhi>1</> Electrode near the enemy's position that attacks once every <shuzhi>1.5</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>{2}%</> of ATK + <shuzhi>{3}</>.
The Electrode gains <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's stats, can be attacked or healed, and loses <shuzhi>3%</> of its max HP every second.
Only <shuzhi>1</> Electrode can exist at any given time, and summoning a new Electrode will replace the previous one.
